title: Defendr.gg
description: Gaming security platform where I led technical strategy as Tech Lead/CTO. Architected scalable microservices infrastructure, managed 8+ engineer team, and established development best practices.
longDescription: As Tech Lead/CTO at Defendr.gg, I owned the technical vision for a gaming security platform. Responsibilities included: designing microservices architecture to handle high-load gaming traffic, implementing CI/CD pipelines that reduced deployment time by 40%, leading code review processes, and mentoring a team of 8+ engineers. The platform handles thousands of concurrent users with optimized performance and security protocols.
roleAndImpact: Tech Lead/CTO - Full architecture design, team management, DevOps strategy

title: BeeFood - Food Delivery Platform
description: Full-stack food delivery platform built solo from conception to production. Includes NestJS API, React web app, Flutter mobile app, and AI-based food recommendations using TensorFlow.
longDescription: BeeFood is a comprehensive food delivery ecosystem I solo-developed. The backend (NestJS + GraphQL) handles 10k+ daily transactions with real-time order tracking. Frontend features responsive React UI with real-time updates. Mobile app built with Flutter provides native iOS/Android experience. Integrated AI recommendation engine using TensorFlow for personalized food suggestions. Full Docker containerization and deployment pipeline.
roleAndImpact: Solo Architect & Developer - Entire platform design, backend, frontend, mobile

title: Food Suggestion AI System
description: Machine learning model for personalized food recommendations. Designed and trained TensorFlow models with Python to provide intelligent suggestions based on user preferences.
longDescription: Developed an AI-powered recommendation engine integrated into BeeFood platform. The system uses TensorFlow to analyze user behavior, food preferences, and dietary patterns to deliver personalized food suggestions. Model training pipeline built with Python for continuous improvement. Achieved 85%+ accuracy in recommendation predictions.
roleAndImpact: ML Engineer - Model design, training, and deployment

title: PicClic - Web Scraping & Image Tool
description: Web scraping platform with image extraction and manipulation capabilities. Built with Express backend, React frontend, and MongoDB database using GraphQL API.
longDescription: PicClic is a web scraping tool for image discovery and manipulation. Features include: automated web scraping to extract images from target websites, advanced image processing and filtering, user-friendly React interface, and GraphQL API for flexible querying. Implemented with MongoDB for efficient image metadata storage, TailwindCSS for modern UI, and Express backend.

title: Upkrus E-Learning Platform Enhancement
description: Refactored and enhanced e-learning platform architecture. Improved code quality by 35%, optimized API performance, and unified frontend stack across React and Angular.
longDescription: Collaborated on Upkrus, a comprehensive e-learning platform. Key contributions: refactored monolithic codebase to microservices architecture improving maintainability, optimized database queries reducing load times by 15%, unified frontend components across React and Angular, improved API response times through caching strategies, and established code quality standards through rigorous code reviews.
roleAndImpact: Backend & Frontend Developer - Architecture improvement, code quality

title: Guide Alize - Medical Assistant Platform
description: Healthcare platform for medical professionals featuring real-time data and optimized performance. Enhanced UI/UX, improved load times by 5%, and implemented secure authentication.
longDescription: Guide Alize is a medical assistance platform used by healthcare professionals. Responsibilities included: updating and improving UI/UX design, optimizing platform performance (5% load time improvement), implementing enterprise-grade authentication and security protocols, enhancing React Native mobile app, and ensuring HIPAA compliance for sensitive medical data.
roleAndImpact: Full-Stack Developer - Performance optimization, security implementation
